messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Duck Egg source?
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to let you know that the link was incorrect - I dug around and this looks like the right one... http://mcmurrayhatchery.com/ I ve been a lurker for
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to let you know that the link was incorrect - I dug around and this looks like the right one... http://mcmurrayhatchery.com/

I've been a lurker for awhile...  Really starting to lean towards unschooling my 2 year old and his sibling who's expected around Thanksgiving!  I'm enjoying all of the discussions on what to do with the kids and how to go about it and it just seems like a perfect fit for us to keep doing what we've been doing with Cort - learn from the world!

Thanks for all the information!

Annie

Ron and Stephanie wrote:

From: "Ron and Stephanie" <ronandstphanie@...>

www.murraymcmurray.com
This is an excellent source of eggs to hatch. Have fun!
Stephanie
Mommy and Teacher to four homeschooling wonders, wife to the best principal,
and protector of a Standardbred horse, Chow Chow, Yorkshire Terrier, six odd
lot chickens, and a turtle...
